scenarios.title: FRIEND'S BIRTHDAY
scenarios.description: Your best friend is turning 15! They're having dinner at a restaurant.

outcome.title: Good Times!
outcome.message: You had a blast with your friend!
outcome.tip: Social experiences matter! But track how often you make exceptions.

outcome.title: Nice Balance!
outcome.message: Your friend loved the thoughtful gift!
outcome.tip: Finding the middle ground shows great money skills!

outcome.title: Tough Choice
outcome.tip: Sometimes saying no is the right choice!

scenarios.title: NEW GAME RELEASE
scenarios.description: That game you've been waiting for just came out! Everyone's playing it.
scenarios.prompt: It costs $60. All your friends have it.

outcome.title: Fun But Costly
outcome.message: The game is awesome! But your goal got further away.
outcome.tip: FOMO is real, but games go on sale. Patience pays off!

outcome.title: Patient Gamer!
outcome.message: You'll get it eventually for less!
outcome.tip: Games almost always go on sale. Waiting saves 50% or more!

scenarios.title: LUNCH WITH FRIENDS
scenarios.description: Your friends are going out for pizza after school.
scenarios.prompt: It'll cost about $12. You packed lunch today.

outcome.title: Savings Win!
outcome.message: You still hung out! Just ate your own food.
outcome.tip: Eating packed lunch saves hundreds per year!

scenarios.title: COOL FIND
scenarios.description: You're at the mall and see something awesome on sale‚Äî50% off!
scenarios.prompt: It's $20 (was $40). You don't need it but want it.

outcome.title: Impulse Buy
outcome.message: It's cool, but did you really need it?
outcome.tip: A sale on something you don't need isn't saving money!

outcome.title: Strong Willpower!
outcome.message: You stayed focused on your goal!
outcome.tip: Every 'no' to something you don't need is a 'yes' to your goal!

scenarios.title: CRACKED SCREEN
scenarios.description: You dropped your phone and the screen cracked. It still works but looks bad.
scenarios.prompt: Repair costs $40. What do you do?

outcome.title: Good as New!
outcome.message: Phone is fixed! But your savings took a hit.
outcome.tip: This is why emergency funds matter!

outcome.title: Smart Move!
outcome.message: It's not pretty, but it works!
outcome.tip: Not every problem needs an immediate fix.
